com.davidsoergel.dsutils
Interface UrlContentCache

All Known Implementing Classes:
UrlContentCacheImpl
public interface UrlContentCache

Cache URL contents in the filesystem. Maintains checksum files for verification, and stores the last access time for the file as the modified date on the checksum file (since that's the only one available to us in Java). For now, ignores expiration times and other such HTTP metadata. Enforces a maximum size on the cache, keeping the most recently accessed files and expiring older ones as needed.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel

Method Detail

clear

void clear()
Clear the disk cache.

getChecksum

String getChecksum(String s)
                   throws MalformedURLException,
                          UrlContentCacheException
Get the checksum for the file identified by the given URL.

Parameters:
s - a String containing a URL.
Returns:
a String containing some kind of checksum (perhaps just an integer, in the case of crc32).
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the provided string is not a valid URL.
UrlContentCacheException - if anything else goes wrong

getChecksum

String getChecksum(URL s)
                   throws UrlContentCacheException
Gets the checksum for the file identified by the given URL.

Parameters:
s - a URL.
Returns:
a String containing some kind of checksum (perhaps just an integer, in the case of crc32).
Throws:
UrlContentCacheException - if anything goes wrong

getFile

@NotNull
File getFile(String url)
             throws UrlContentCacheException,
                    MalformedURLException
Gets a file identified by the given URL. If the file is available in the cache, it is simply returned; otherwise it is retrieved and cached first. This may cause other files to be expired from the cache to make space.

Parameters:
url - a String containing a URL.
Returns:
the File
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the provided string is not a valid URL.
UrlContentCacheException - if anything else goes wrong

getFile

@NotNull
File getFile(URL url,
                     String checksum)
             throws UrlContentCacheException
Gets a file identified by the given URL, verifying that it matches the given checksum. If the file is available in the cache and the checksum matches, it is simply returned; otherwise it is retrieved and cached first. This may cause other files to be expired from the cache to make space.

Parameters:
url - a URL.
Returns:
the File
Throws:
UrlContentCacheException - if anything else goes wrong

recalculateChecksum

String recalculateChecksum(String s)
                           throws MalformedURLException,
                                  UrlContentCacheException
Recomputes the checksum for the file identified by the given URL, and returns it. Retrieves and caches the file first, if necessary. This may cause other files to be expired from the cache to make space.

Parameters:
url - a String containing a URL.
Returns:
the File
Throws:
MalformedURLException - if the provided string is not a valid URL.
UrlContentCacheException - if anything else goes wrong

url - a URL.
Returns:
the File
Throws:
UrlContentCacheException - if anything goes wrong

setMaxSize

void setMaxSize(long maxSize)
Sets the maximum disk space that the cache may use, in bytes. This takes effect when there is an attempt to download a new file, at which point old files are expired from the cache until there is enough room for the new one.

Parameters:
maxSize - the maximum disk space that the cache may use, in bytes.
